data.lyric:
[ti:Prayed For You]
[ar:Matt Stell]
[al:Prayed For You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Prayed For You - Matt Stell
[00:10.59]Produced by：Ash Bowers/Matt Stell
[00:21.18]I've never been one to ask for help
[00:27.37]If I need a mountain moved I move it myself
[00:33.10]I ain't the church pew regular twice on sunday
[00:37.09]Quote you the scripture kind
[00:39.81]I'm far from a preacher
[00:43.21]But I'm a believer
[00:48.12]'Cause every single day
[00:49.70]Before I knew your name
[00:51.43]I couldn't see your face
[00:53.07]But I prayed for you
[00:54.79]Every heartbreak trail when all hope fell
[00:58.40]On the highway to hell
[01:00.11]I prayed for you
[01:01.87]I kept my faith like that old King James
[01:05.41]Said I'm supposed to
[01:08.04]It's hard to imagine
[01:09.65]Bigger than I could fathom
[01:11.35]I didn't know you from Adam
[01:13.70]But I prayed for you
[01:22.29]For someone to love me like you do
[01:29.72]Graceful eyes to see me through
[01:35.28]A smile that steals me
[01:37.23]A heart that heals me
[01:38.89]A touch that kills me too
[01:41.54]Baby your perfect
[01:44.50]I guess the good Lord heard it
[01:49.92]'Cause every single day
[01:51.48]Before I knew your name
[01:53.12]I couldn't see your face
[01:54.86]But I prayed for you
[01:56.54]Every heartbreak trail when all hope fell
[02:00.03]On the highway to hell
[02:01.83]I prayed for you
[02:03.64]I kept my faith like that old King James
[02:07.12]Said I'm supposed to
[02:09.78]It's hard to imagine
[02:11.38]Bigger than I could fathom
[02:13.09]I didn't know you from Adam
[02:15.42]But I prayed for you
[02:30.95]Every single day
[02:32.58]Before I knew your name
[02:34.30]I couldn't see your face
[02:35.97]But I prayed for you
[02:37.64]Every tail light fade in the goodbye rain
[02:41.29]Girl even today
[02:43.05]I prayed for you
[02:44.72]I kept my faith like that old King James
[02:48.23]Said I'm supposed to
[02:51.00]It's hard to imagine
[02:52.46]Bigger than I could fathom
[02:54.13]I didn't know you from Adam
[02:56.58]But I prayed for you
[03:03.35]I prayed for you
[03:10.24]I prayed for you
data.trans:
[ti:Prayed For You]
[ar:Matt Stell]
[al:Prayed For You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.59]//
[00:21.18]我从不寻求帮助
[00:27.37]就算事情再难 我也会独立完成
[00:33.10]我并不是周天早晚做礼拜的教众
[00:37.09]引用圣经的话
[00:39.81]我根本不是牧师
[00:43.21]但我是个信徒
[00:48.12]因为每一天
[00:49.70]在我知道你的名字之前
[00:51.43]我不知道你的模样
[00:53.07]但我为你祈祷
[00:54.79]心碎的痕迹出现在希望落空之时
[00:58.40]一直通向地狱
[01:00.11]我为你祈祷
[01:01.87]我会像国王詹姆士一世一样坚守信仰
[01:05.41]我想我应该这样
[01:08.04]很难想象
[01:09.65]复杂得令人费解
[01:11.35]从始至终 我根本不认识你
[01:13.70]但我为你祈祷
[01:22.29]为那些像你一样爱我的人祈祷
[01:29.72]你美丽的眼睛可以看透我
[01:35.28]你的微笑可以偷走我的心
[01:37.23]你的心灵可以将我治愈
[01:38.89]你的爱抚让我彻底沉沦
[01:41.54]宝贝你很完美
[01:44.50]我猜上帝听见了
[01:49.92]因为每一天
[01:51.48]在我知道你的名字之前
[01:53.12]我不知道你的模样
[01:54.86]但我为你祈祷
[01:56.54]心碎的痕迹出现在希望落空之时
[02:00.03]一直通向地狱
[02:01.83]我为你祈祷
[02:03.64]我会像国王詹姆士一世一样坚守信仰
[02:07.12]我想我应该这样
[02:09.78]很难想象
[02:11.38]复杂得令人费解
[02:13.09]从始至终 我根本不认识你
[02:15.42]但我为你祈祷
[02:30.95]因为每一天
[02:32.58]在我知道你的名字之前
[02:34.30]我不知道你的模样
[02:35.97]但我为你祈祷
[02:37.64]汽车的尾灯消散在离别的雨中
[02:41.29]女孩 今天
[02:43.05]我依然为你祈祷
[02:44.72]我会像国王詹姆士一世一样坚守信仰
[02:48.23]我想我应该这样
[02:51.00]很难想象
[02:52.46]复杂得令人费解
[02:54.13]从始至终 我根本不认识你
[02:56.58]但我为你祈祷
[03:03.35]我为你祈祷
[03:10.24]我为你祈祷
